select
p.id as peid, p.nombre as penombre , p.apellido as peapellido , p.correo as pecorreo , p.contasena as peconstrase単a ,
m.telefono as mtelefono, m.programaacademico as mprogramaacademico,
s.numero as snumero, s.ano as sano, s.periodoAcademico as speriodoacademico, s.fechaInicio as sfechainicio, s.fechaFin as sfechafin
FROM monitor as m left join persona as p on m.persona_id = p.id left join semestre as s on m.semestreIngreso_Numero=s.numero WHERE m.persona_id=#{id}

select
p.id as peid, p.nombre as penombre , p.apellido as peapellido , p.correo as pecorreo , p.contasena as peconstrase単a ,

m.telefono as mtelefono, m.programaacademico as mprogramaacademico,
s.numero as snumero, s.ano as sano, s.periodoAcademico as speriodoacademico, s.fechaInicio as sfechainicio, s.fechaFin as sfechafin
